summary: In order to win his love back, a rebellious youth accepts a deadly challenge from her father with several hurdles.
cast: Sohail Khan|Sameera Reddy|Sanjay Dutt|Kabir Bedi|Dalip Tahil|Amrita Prakash|Rajpal Yadav|Sarfaraz Khan|Heenaa Biswas|Eijaz Khan|Aasif Sheikh|Archana Puran Singh|Neeraj Vora|Sada Yadav
title: Maine Dil Tujhko Diya
